tool_description: Scan QR & Barcode images from files or URLs and return the equivalent QR-Text or Barcode-Number plus code format.
name: QR-Scanner-Api
title: QR-Scanner-Api

api_list.name: ScanImageUrl
api_list.description: Scan image from URL and return QR text or Barcode number.

required_parameters.name: imageUrl
required_parameters.description: Image URL which you want to scan

result.description: Respons Result : Expected output with 'Success' status OR error description with 'Failure' status
